'''Co-CreateLinux''' (formerly ''OpenDesktop'') is a [[Linux distribution]]. It is a product of OpenDesktop.net, an [[open source]] developer community of [[China|Chinese]] developers. The project is sponsored by several large software companies, universities, and research centres from around China. The Co-CreateLinux distribution is designed for businesses and the home desktop market, and its main features are simplified installation procedure, high compatibility with [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], and ease of use. It is based on [[Fedora Core]] and released under the [[GNU GPL]].
+
'''Co-CreateLinux''' (formerly ''OpenDesktop'') is a [[Linux distribution]]. It is a product of OpenDesktop.net, an [[open source]] developer community of [[China|Chinese]] developers. The project is sponsored by several large software companies, universities, and research centres from around China. The Co-CreateLinux distribution is designed for businesses and the home desktop market, and its main features are simplified installation procedure, high compatibility with [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], and ease of use. It is based on [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] and released under the [[GNU GPL]].
